name: Follower (Isaiah222)
description:
Based on the verse ”To this you were called, because Christ suffered for you, leaving you an example, that you should follow in his steps.”, 1 Peter 2:21, I created this game where you the player have to ascend a mountain/cliff following the footstep symbols. Only when following the steps you can ascend, else you will fall off. Try follow as many footsteps as possible for a higher score!

You navigate the game by pressing the left mouse button. Try reach all 25 footsteps!

Graphic and music is made by my self.
